title: Smart Data Models - Risk Assessment - Network Service Alert

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to Risk.

validTo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The time at which the risk materialization is started.

validFrom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The time at which the risk materialization is finished.

severity.description: Property. The impact generated by the associated Risk. Enum:'LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH'

subcategory.description: Property. The MITRE subcategory of an Alert.

category.description: Property. The MITRE category of an Alert.

idCode.description: Property. The MITRE code/id of an Alert.

identify.description: Relationship. Array of URIs related to the Mitigation Measures.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
